name: Break the Rules
description:
Break the Rules is a game about breaking the Rules

Each level has a set of defined rules and a programmable decision tree to break specific rules.

Controls (In general)

  • A or Left to move Left
  • D or Right to move Right
  • Space to Jump
  • + or > to skip a stage
  • - o r < to go back
  • Click Program to enter Programing mode
    • Click and drag pixels to the AI window to create trees
      • Then pick a color to set the trigger to
      • clicking on the right color box will allow it to be reset
      • clicking on the left color box will allow the pixel to be moved
    • Click and drag Unlocked Rules or Logic operators into the AI windows
    • Click the half circles to drag connections between blocks
    • Right click to delete a block
    • Levels must be completed with the AI menu closed
    • Middle click and drag to move around program
    • Scroll wheel to scroll rules list

Donations
